name: native-dash
description: a replacement of lodash functions that are exported in both CJS and ES but where there are zero dependencies ... just modern JS code.
author: Ken Snyder <ken@ken.net>

hooks.pre-merge-commit: yarn build && yarn do validate TscFailure --error=release && yarn do validate TestingFailure --error=release && yarn do validate NpmVersion --error develop
hooks.pre-commit: yarn do validate TscFailure --default warn --error develop && yarn do validate TestingFailure --error develop && yarn do validate NpmVersion --warn release,hotfix
